name: Alejandro A. Garza
description: I joined the team because I have always been passionate about clean energy and electric cars. Also I get to meet great people that share the same interests as me. Fun Fact: I love Mexican food.

name: Liam Stoddard
description: To apply my knowledge, learn new skills, and work with new technology. Fun Fact: I piloted a helicopter once. It was terrifying.

name: Jayden Bischoff
description: The solar car team provided me with the opportunity to develop my understanding and knowledge of software engineering, while promoting innovation and sustainability.

name: Sami Abdelhalem
description: To help make sustainable technology more efficient. Fun Fact: I was born in the arctic.

name: Brandon Liao
description: I was always super curious about solar powered cars and how they work. Fun Fact: I used to do 100m sprints in the track team back in highschool.

name: Kayla Brehon
description: I joined the team because I wanted to become learn more about and become more involved within the sustainable energy sector! Fun Fact: I am a foil fencer!

name: Christopher Chou
description: Fun Fact: I have a hard time remembering lyrics, however I do like to rap! I also played the tuba for 4 years.

name: Brandon Tran
description: I liked the idea of designing and creating an electric car. Fun Fact: I like creating costumes that have mechanisms. I am also left handed.

name: Navjot Brar
description: I joined the team to develop the skills to work in a group to build a large project together. I wanted to work with hardworking students to accomplish the common goal of pushing the boundaries in the field of Solar Cars.

name: Ismail Majed
description: To gain some design experience and apply everything I've learned on something tangible. Fun Fact: I love pineapple on pizza.

name: Andy Smit
description: To learn more and gain experience in engineering. Fun Fact: I was part of the technical theatre program at my high school.

name: Andy Smit2
description: To learn more and gain experience in engineering. Fun Fact: I was part of the technical theatre program at my high school.
